participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and sensitive, often worried about the expectations of others.
participant_1.background: I'm afraid of disappointing my family. I use my iPhone 7 to secretly call my boyfriend when I'm out with my parents. I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it. My horse never talks back to me. I went to Japan during college and stayed with a host family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and adventurous, with a desire to embrace life's contradictions.
participant_2.background: I love taking my golden retriever puppy to the park and playing fetch. I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera. My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am. I miss my motorcycle and wish I could still have it, but I'm happy with my car. I can’t sing very well.

content.text: Pretty good! Just got done taking my golden retriever puppy to the park, he's so energetic! How about you?
That's awesome! I'm a little jealous, actually. I love dogs, but I don't have one right now.
You should totally get one! They're so much fun and they make great companions.
I know, I know...I've been thinking about it for a while. I just need to find the right time and place.
Well, when you do, I highly recommend a golden retriever. They're the best!
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll definitely keep that in mind.
No problem! So what are you up to today?
Not much really. Just hanging out and relaxing. I might go for a walk later, it's supposed to be a nice day outside.
That sounds like a good plan. I might do the same thing. I love taking pictures of the city, so I'll probably go for a walk around downtown.
That sounds like fun! I love taking pictures too. Maybe we could meet up sometime and take some pictures together?
That would be great! I'd love to meet up and take some pictures together.
Awesome! I'll PM you and we can figure out a time to meet up.
